post.text: I believe in America First and that means FAMILY FIRST! My childcare plan reflects the needs of modern working-class families -- 100% deductible childcare expenses, paid maternity leave and dependent care savings. It's a great plan that will benefit ALL American families. My daughter Ivanka has done an incredible job -- so proud!

comment.author: Bethany
comment.text: no one gave us this crap or my parents this crap and we survived! I'm tired of paying taxes for everyone else to get their "freebies"

replies.author: Leah
replies.text: Trump's lowering taxes. This plan uses tax deductions and savings accounts to do it.

replies.author: Eli
replies.text: He is lowering his taxes... Oh wait he doesn't even pay taxes... Shameful.. I'm a vet and he is a disgrace for not helping the army by not paying his taxes

replies.author: Bethany
replies.text: Eli Basta I didn't say anything about Trump.

replies.author: Lindsey
replies.text: I'm not sure how any veteran could support Hillary with her record of endangering our national security, but as she would say "what difference does it make?" SMH.
